title: Ray Meyer Fitness Center  |  Buildings  |  Campus Maps  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Ray Meyer Fitness Center Four-court gymnasium Four-lane, 200-meter running track Cardio machines Free weights Group fitness studios Racquetball courts Spin studio Strength training equipment 25-yard, six-lane lap and recreation pool Membership at The Ray is free for students. The Bean Caff√©, which offers healthy snacks and sandwiches, is located in the lobby of The Ray. The fourth floor provides magnificent views of the Chicago skyline and our beautiful Lincoln Park campus.
